name: backend
description: I-cloud is a web-based solution built using the MERN stack, tailored for uploading and downloading large files seamlessly. With support for files up to 100GB, I-cloud integrates advanced features such as chunked file transfer, resume capabilities for interrupted uploads, and a secure sign-in mechanism. This platform serves as an invaluable tool for users needing to manage large datasets, media files, or backups efficiently and securely.
author: echcharqui hamza
